attributes.action: give a posthumous knighthood to Michael Jackson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that Michael Jackson was one of the greatest entertainers on earth.

I also believe he was one of the most giving people on earth.

In 2000, the Guinness Book of World Records cited Michael Jackson for holding the world record for the “Most Charities Supported by a Pop Star.”  

He did so much work for charities devoted to African relief, college scholarships and HIV/AIDS.  In 1992, he founded the Heal the World Foundation to relieve the suffering of children around the world

Bob Geldoff was knighted for similar work, and I believe Michael Jackson should be honoured as well.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
